 Personal data: 
Name: Luis Caballero Alcalde.

Email: luis.caballero.alcalde@gmail.com 
My professional experience would be based on twenty years working within the 
Industrial/Energy sector, with the most advanced experience developing business, detecting 
key opportunities as well as managing resources with a strategic vision. 
2G Energy  
Head of Sales and Business Development, 2G Solutions 
2G Solutions, the 2G Energy AG group affiliated company, responsible for high performance 
and quality energy plants, distribution, installation and maintenance, in Spain, Portugal, north 
Africa and Latin America.  
Especial applications for renewable gases, biogas and hydrogen, as well as solar PV hybrid

1 
 Personal data: 
Name: Luis Caballero Alcalde.       
Mobil:       +34 680 56 94 15. 
Email: luis.caballero.alcalde@gmail.com 
My professional experience would be based on twenty years working within the 
Industrial/Energy sector, with the most advanced experience developing business, detecting 
key opportunities as well as managing resources with a strategic vision. 
2G Energy  
Head of Sales and Business Development, 2G Solutions 
2G Solutions, the 2G Energy AG group affiliated company, responsible for high performance 
and quality energy plants, distribution, installation and maintenance, in Spain, Portugal, north 
Africa and Latin America.  
Especial applications for renewable gases, biogas and hydrogen, as well as solar PV hybrid 
plants. Projects based on PPA, pool or auction. 
 
Baker Hughes   
(A GE Company, 2016-2020) Turbomachinery & Process Solutions, Regional Sales Director, 
Industrial and New Energies Transition Segment  
Develop Industrial segment/vertical, product portfolio for Europe, SSA, Israel, Russia and CIS. 
Mainly focus on new energy solutions, as well as on renewable gases. 
Driving TPS forces, covering complete sales process. Creating momentum and growth 
initiatives. 
Successful sales track record to meet order intake and margin targets, as well as business 
transformation to match with specific long-term dynamics of key markets and areas. 
Aligning resources to achieve Product Company and Unit objectives. 
General Electric  
(2012-2016) Executive Key Accounts  
Being part of Global Power Sales organization (GPS), a sales organization responsible for “One 
Face” to the Customer for Thermal and Renewable (CSP, Wind and Biomass) Power Sector. 
Understanding customers and market needs to develop business along with Product Lines, 
promoting company portfolio, focused on achieving financial objectives (KPI´s).  
Acting as Business Developer, growing new initiatives, mainly focus on utilities, EPCs and 
developers. 

CV_ Luis Caballero Alcalde   
2 
 Alstom Power 
 (2008-2012) Thermal Services Director Iberia. 
Building up a new department within Iberia Service organization. I had the task to select 
resources, execute projects on going and to develop the business, creating a training program, 
closing internal agreements with others Alstom Business Units to stablish right work lines, 
division of works and frameworks. 
It was a product-oriented organization, later on after changing to a functional one, I change to 
manage the Iberia Sales department, where I developed and designed new processes for sales.  
Mainly during this period, we strove against the crisis trying to keep the organization and 
capabilities, focus on keeping KPIs (Orders, Sales, OM). In addition, to keep orders level it was 
developed services outside Iberia, to others Service organizations with no expertise.  
(2004-2008)  Thermal Service Iberia.  
Initially started as a Sales & PM Engineer within Thermal Service (TS) org.  
(2000-2004), Abengoa 
My career starts up within this Multinational Company, leader in the Industrial/Energy sector 
for Renewable plants (Energy Division, Information Technology), developing IT platforms, as 
Sales Software Engineer. Tasks: 
- Carrying out technical/economic deals and offers.  
- Contact and negotiate with clients and suppliers.  
- Project Management.  
Focus mainly in Scadas, DCS, DMS and IT platform solutions for the Energy Business. 
Main achievements were to develop business in Asia, in particular for India, closing local key 
partnerships, as Larsen&Toubro, as well as getting the first contract with an important Energy 
Customer as Reliance Group. 
Main Background: 
- Bachelor Engineer Degree (2000) 
- ExMBA IE Business School (2010) 
- Master in Finance, Energy. CIIF (2015)

career_advancement: Focus on building core technical skills
Seek mentorship from senior team members
Take on challenging projects to gain experience
